name: A Game Evolution
description:
A Game Evolution

This is a Game for a GameJam!

Credits:

Music: Evan King/ Neo Nomen

Sound Effects: Free Sounds

Gun: Slava Temlyanik

Controls: 

WASD to move

Left Click to Shoot

Space to JUMP

The Developers from the Game Series, were very lazy and didnt wanted to give the turrets animations. That is because the Turrets are so bad looking
